Name: 破镜恐惧
About the game: Design roles： You will design the role yourself and adjust its basic attributes and skill assignments. A strong physique will help you convince the thugs, and good shooting skills will allow you to end the fight before it officially starts. About options： In the course of probing the case, you will be faced with many choices: persuasion with a kind tone and clear logic, or taking out a police badge and ferocious threats; or, in the face of a crisis, to move forward without hesitation, or to follow the will to turn around and leave? About dice： Every choice you make will be decided by fate. The only thing you can do is to be ready before the verdict comes. About the investigation： When you search for the truth, you will get a lot of clues and information, either related to the case or local customs, which will help you understand the work at hand and the city of Nabos you are facing right now. it will also bring you closer to the dark secrets of truth and secrecy. About the Nabos： This is a small seaside town with a long history, but it hides dark secrets that people can avoid. The crime rate here remains high all the year round, and there are ancient gang families and mysterious cults entrenched here, guarding dark secrets and seeking their own interests. Be careful not to get in their way, or is that why you're here? About our game： At this stage, the game has only completed the preface part, because of indescribable reasons, we decided to sell by chapter. There are expected to be three chapters and multiple branches. At present, the text volume of the preface has exceeded 100,000 words, nearly 100 options, and two plot lines. After that, the volume of the content of the chapter is guaranteed, and we also hope to improve the quality. I hope you will give us a lot of support and give us valuable advice. Unfortunately, our game only supports Chinese at this stage, please understand. If you have any better suggestions and comments, please contact our email 3231346098@qq.com .
